metadata.Title: CVE-2020-14201 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Dolibarr CRM before 11.0.5 allows privilege escalation. This could allow remote authenticated attackers to upload arbitrary files via societe/document.php in which "disabled" is changed to "enabled" in the HTML source code.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
